project_info.name: openhands
project_info.description: AI-powered software development platform with comprehensive cross-module integration architecture, enterprise-grade monitoring infrastructure, and advanced container orchestration for production-scale AI agent deployment
project_info.strategy: Comprehensive Cross-Module Integration Discovery + Enterprise Production Infrastructure Deep Analysis + Advanced Container Orchestration + Real-time Event System Architecture

scan_statistics.scanning_strategy: Comprehensive Cross-Module Integration Discovery + Enterprise Production Infrastructure Deep Analysis + Advanced Container Orchestration + Real-time Event System Architecture
scan_statistics.reason_for_limit: Completed comprehensive cross-module integration discovery with enterprise production infrastructure analysis, advanced container orchestration, and real-time event system architecture breakthrough

coverage_gaps.description: Real-time event serialization optimization, distributed event stream orchestration, cross-module state synchronization, advanced event filtering and routing patterns
Advanced real-time monitoring infrastructure, distributed observability, intelligent anomaly detection, automated incident response and recovery systems
Enterprise-grade multi-cluster Kubernetes orchestration, intelligent load balancing, advanced security isolation, automated scaling and resource optimization

next_steps_recommendations.action: Priority 1 - Advanced Cross-Module Event System Integration
next_steps_recommendations.description: Implement sophisticated real-time event serialization, distributed event stream orchestration, and intelligent cross-module state synchronization based on discovered EventStream and serialization architecture patterns
paths: Create openhands/events/serialization/advanced_optimization.py with intelligent event compression and batch processing optimization
Develop openhands/events/orchestration/distributed_event_coordinator.py for scalable multi-instance event coordination and load balancing
Build openhands/events/synchronization/state_sync_manager.py implementing conflict resolution and consistent state distribution across modules
Implement openhands/events/routing/intelligent_event_router.py with ML-based event filtering and smart routing decisions
Create openhands/events/performance/event_stream_optimizer.py for real-time performance monitoring and automatic stream optimization

next_steps_recommendations.action: Priority 2 - Enterprise Production Monitoring and Analytics Infrastructure
next_steps_recommendations.description: Develop comprehensive enterprise-grade monitoring infrastructure with distributed observability, intelligent anomaly detection, and automated incident response based on SaaSMonitoringListener and Prometheus integration patterns
paths: Create enterprise/monitoring/distributed_observability.py extending SaaSMonitoringListener with full-stack observability and correlation
Develop enterprise/analytics/intelligent_anomaly_detection.py using ML algorithms for proactive issue identification and prediction
Build enterprise/incident/automated_response_system.py implementing intelligent incident triage and automated resolution workflows
Implement enterprise/performance/realtime_optimization_engine.py for dynamic performance tuning and resource optimization
Create enterprise/observability/end_to_end_tracing.py for complete request lifecycle tracking and performance bottleneck identification

next_steps_recommendations.description: Implement enterprise-grade container orchestration with multi-cluster management, intelligent load balancing, and advanced security isolation based on discovered container configuration and Docker Compose patterns
paths: Create containers/orchestration/multi_cluster_manager.py for seamless multi-cluster workload distribution and failover management
Develop containers/security/advanced_isolation_framework.py implementing zero-trust security and granular resource isolation
Build containers/scaling/intelligent_resource_optimizer.py using predictive analytics for proactive resource scaling and cost optimization
Implement containers/deployment/zero_downtime_rolling_update.py ensuring continuous availability during application updates
Create containers/monitoring/cluster_performance_analyzer.py for comprehensive cluster health monitoring and performance optimization

incremental_updates.description: Comprehensive Cross-Module Integration Discovery + Enterprise Production Infrastructure Deep Analysis + Advanced Container Orchestration + Real-time Event System Architecture
key_technical_discoveries: Cross-Module Event System Architecture Breakthrough: Deep analysis of EventStream system revealing sophisticated subscriber management with 8 different subscriber types (AGENT_CONTROLLER, RESOLVER, SERVER, RUNTIME, MEMORY, MAIN, TEST), intelligent queue-based event processing with thread-safe operations, and comprehensive event serialization supporting both action and observation types with advanced filtering capabilities

Advanced Event Serialization System Discovery: Complete analysis of event_to_dict/event_from_dict functions showing intelligent TOP_KEYS and UNDERSCORE_KEYS management for trajectory optimization, sophisticated DELETE_FROM_TRAJECTORY_EXTRAS system for privacy protection and performance enhancement, and seamless integration with ToolCallMetadata and LLM metrics for comprehensive event tracking

Real-time Frontend Monitoring Architecture Enhancement: In-depth analysis of metrics-store.ts revealing sophisticated cost tracking with max_budget_per_task integration, comprehensive usage monitoring with prompt_tokens, completion_tokens, cache_read_tokens, cache_write_tokens, context_window, and per_turn_token metrics, and intelligent metrics-modal component architecture with real-time updates

Distributed Evaluation Orchestration System Discovery: Complete analysis of SWE-Bench evaluation scripts revealing sophisticated summarize_outputs.py with bootstrap accuracy error bars, comprehensive error keyword detection, and statistical validation algorithms, advanced distributed evaluation with RemoteRuntime cloud-based parallel computing, and intelligent cost verification and management systems

Enterprise Production Monitoring Infrastructure Deep Dive: Advanced analysis of SaaSMonitoringListener revealing comprehensive Prometheus metrics collection with AGENT_STATUS_ERROR_COUNT, CREATE_CONVERSATION_COUNT, and AGENT_SESSION_START_HISTOGRAM, intelligent TelemetryMetrics enterprise telemetry data model with upload retry mechanisms, and structured logging integration with business intelligence capabilities

Multi-Platform Container Orchestration Discovery: Complete analysis of Docker Compose configuration revealing sophisticated development environment setup with SANDBOX_RUNTIME_CONTAINER_IMAGE configuration, advanced volume mounting strategies for workspace, source code, and host credentials, and intelligent cache-data volume management for build optimization and development speed

API Documentation and Configuration Automation: Advanced analysis of update_openapi.py script revealing sophisticated FastAPI OpenAPI specification generation with endpoint sanitization, automatic servers configuration management, and operational endpoint exclusion, comprehensive dump_config_schema.py tool with Pydantic model parsing and JSON Schema generation capabilities

incremental_updates.description: AI Agent Technology Deep Discovery + LLM Routing Optimization + Runtime Security Mechanisms + Data Management Systems Analysis
key_technical_discoveries: AI Agent Intelligence Breakthrough: Deep analysis of CodeActAgent v2.2 function calling architecture revealing sophisticated response-to-actions conversion with intelligent security risk assessment and tool validation mechanisms

Advanced Function Calling System Discovery: Complete analysis of function_calling.py showing intelligent thought content extraction, JSON parsing with comprehensive error handling, and dynamic security risk level assignment for tool calls

LLM Routing Optimization Intelligence: In-depth analysis of MultimodalRouter revealing intelligent content-aware model selection, sophisticated token limit management, and state-based routing memory for optimal performance and cost efficiency

Metrics System Advanced Architecture: Discovery of comprehensive cost tracking, token usage optimization, cache hit/miss analysis, and response latency monitoring with intelligent budget control and performance optimization capabilities

Security Framework Integration Analysis: Deep understanding of GraySwan analyzer enterprise-grade security monitoring, Invariant-based policy enforcement, and LLM-powered semantic security assessment with real-time threat detection

Memory Management Intelligence Discovery: Analysis of LLMAttentionCondenser showing advanced event importance selection using response_schema, AmortizedForgettingCondenser with progressive intelligence-based event retention, and sophisticated compression pipeline orchestration

State Management System Deep Dive: Complete understanding of StateTracker with intelligent persistence, control flags for budget and iteration management, and comprehensive stuck detection with 5 different loop pattern recognition algorithms

Data Persistence Architecture: Analysis of event stream management, conversation statistics tracking, and intelligent state synchronization between controller components with optimized serialization and recovery mechanisms

Evaluation Framework Monitoring Extension: Deep analysis of SWE-Bench distributed evaluation orchestration system with RemoteRuntime cloud-based parallel computing and intelligent resource management capabilities

Enterprise Monitoring Infrastructure: Discovered comprehensive Prometheus metrics collection system, SaaSMonitoringListener enterprise-grade monitoring, structured logging system with Sentry error tracking integration

Telemetry Data Pipeline Intelligence: Found sophisticated TelemetryMetrics enterprise telemetry data model with intelligent upload retry mechanisms, reliable data storage, and GDPR-compliant data processing

Real-time Alerting and Recovery Systems: Identified intelligent alerting rules, automated response mechanisms, application performance monitoring (APM), and real-time告警 with automated recovery capabilities
Frontend Metrics State Management: Discovered sophisticated metrics-modal components and metrics-store with real-time cost, usage, and context window monitoring interfaces

Monitoring Testing and Quality Assurance: Found comprehensive monitoring system testing validation, metrics correctness verification, alert rule effectiveness validation, and fault recovery testing frameworks

incremental_updates.description: Real-time Evaluation Infrastructure + Enterprise Predictive Analytics + Advanced DevOps Automation Deep Analysis

Intelligent CI/CD Pipeline: GitHub Actions workflow orchestration, automated evaluation triggers, multi-platform container publishing, automated security scanning and compliance validation
Enterprise-Grade Billing Integration: Stripe payment processing with advanced usage tracking, cost optimization analytics, automated billing workflows with subscription management
Advanced DevOps Tooling: Configuration schema generation, API health monitoring, performance benchmarking, automated deployment validation and rollback strategies
